text: Mme go ne go na le thuso ya eng mo go lona go lwantsha dibatana tsa naga, ebong batho bale ba Efeso, fa e ne e le ka ntlha ya se ke se amogelang mo botshelong jono? Fa e le gore ga re kitla re tshela gape re sena go swa, le rona go ka nna botoka gore re tsamaye re ye go iitumedisa; a re jeng, re nweng, mme re itumeleng. Pharologanyo ke eng? Gonne ka moso re a swa, mme seo se lere sengwe le sengwe kwa bokhutlong.
